ComicInfo.Title: The Washed-Up Wizard
ComicInfo.Summary:
In “The Washed-Up Wizard,” Rocky and Bullwinkle help an aged magician regain his fame…but why do the evil Boris and Natasha care about his powers of prestidigitation? That can’t end well! Plus, a Dudley Do-Right story!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Roger Langridge & Jeremy Colwell | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Stephanie Buscema | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-14 00:13:38. [CVDB450097]

ComicInfo.Teams: Boris and Natasha, Bullwinkle and Rocky, Royal Canadian Mounted Police
ComicInfo.Locations: Canada, Earth, Frostbite Falls, Minnesota, Pottsylvania, Space, The Moon
